Name: Chocolate makes you happy: Lunar New Year
About the game: Casual colorful physical puzzle with sweets, jumpers, teleports, accelerators, reverse gravity, traps, treadmills, fires, paper lanterns, dragons and explosions. The goal of the player is to keep the cookies on the chocolate bar for some time to pass the level. In Chocolate makes you happy: Lunar New Year: - 50 levels - Explosions - Jumpers - Teleports - Sweets - Accelerators - Traps - Changing gravity - Treadmills - Dragons - Paper lanterns - Asian art
